sentence.Network_en: He had fuzzy black hair and bright black eyes.
sentence.Network_cn: 他一头柔软卷曲的黑发，眼睛又黑又亮。

sentence.Network_en: The border between science fact and science fiction gets a bit fuzzy.
sentence.Network_cn: 科学事实和科幻小说之间的界限变得有点儿模糊了。

sentence.Network_en: He had little patience for fuzzy ideas.
sentence.Network_cn: 他没什么耐心听那些糊里糊涂的想法。

PerfectNetExp.abs: ...D算法本身也可能产生碰撞，因此在freedb和Gracenote的开发文档中，都要求开发者必须处理“模糊（fuzzy）“————其实就是重复的查询结果。通常的处理方式就是象EAC一样，弹出一个列表让用户自己选。查询fr.
考博英语词汇 ... futile a. 无益的；无效的 fuzzy a. 有绒毛的；绒毛状的；模糊的;失真 gabble v． 急促不清地说话.

而模糊控制(Fuzzy Control)能将操作者或专家的控制经验和知识表示成语言变量描述的控制规则,然后用这些规则去控制系统。模糊逻 …

jx.jx_en_mean: (informal)used to refer to a sentimentally emotional response or something designed to evoke such a response
jx.jx_cn_mean: (非正式)感情上的强烈反应，意在引起感情上强烈反应的事物

lj.lj_ly: babies require a lot of attention, not just momentary warm fuzzies.
lj.lj_ls: 婴儿需要悉心照料，而不只是一时的脉脉温情。

entry.def: Fuzzy hair sticks up in a soft, curly mass.

example.ex: He had fuzzy black hair and bright black eyes.
example.tran: 他一头柔软卷曲的黑发，眼睛又黑又亮。

entry.tran: 覆有细绒毛的;绒毛状的;毛茸茸的
entry.def: If something is fuzzy, it has a covering that feels soft and like fur.

entry.tran: (图片、声音等)不清楚的，模糊的
entry.def: A fuzzy picture, image, or sound is unclear and hard to see or hear.

example.ex: A couple of fuzzy pictures have been published.
example.tran: 有几张模糊的照片刊登了出来。

entry.tran: (人或头脑)稀里糊涂的，迷迷糊糊的
entry.def: If you or your thoughts are fuzzy, you are confused and cannot think clearly.

example.ex: He had little patience for fuzzy ideas.
example.tran: 他没什么耐心听那些糊里糊涂的想法。

entry.def: You describe something as fuzzy when it is vague and not clearly defined.

example.ex: The border between science fact and science fiction gets a bit fuzzy.
example.tran: 科学事实和科幻小说之间的界限变得有点儿模糊了。

entry.def: Fuzzy logic is a type of computer logic that is supposed to imitate the way that humans think, for example by adapting to changing circumstances rather than always following the same procedure.

example.ex: ...domestic appliances that also use fuzzy logic to mimic the way a person would do the job manually.
example.tran: 同样使用模糊逻辑模拟手动操作的家用电器

sentences.sentence: "his head fuzzed like a dandelion gone to seed"

means.word_mean: 3. confused and not coherent; not clearly thought out;

sentences.sentence: "a vague and fuzzy idea of the world of finance"

auth_sentence.content: Escapism and fuzzy thinking; absorbing bogus ideas.
auth_sentence.res_content: Escapism and fuzzy thinking; absorbing bogus ideas.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Escapism and fuzzy thinking; absorbing bogus ideas.

auth_sentence.content: Rocco answered the phone; his voice was fuzzy with sleep.
auth_sentence.res_content: Rocco answered the phone; his voice was fuzzy with sleep.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Rocco answered the phone; his voice was fuzzy with sleep.

auth_sentence.content: Venus appeared very dim and fuzzy.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Venus appeared very dim and fuzzy.

sentences.en: The truck’s headlights were all fuzzy and ghostlike.
sentences.cn: 卡车的前灯光模糊一片，鬼火一样。
